tool_description: Convert from English to Starwars Sith language. The Sith language was the native language of the people of the pureblood Sith from the movie Star Wars. Even after the extinction of the Sith species, the language was preserved in Sith holocrons, temples, and tomes from a different variety of Sith Lords and historians.
title: Sith Translator

api_list.name: /sith.json

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text to convert to Sith Speak.
required_parameters.default: I went to coruscant which was ten parsec away!
